00016 void BaseConnectionManager::initialize(int stage)
00017 {
00018   //BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00019 
00020   if (stage == 0)
00021   {
00022     if(hasPar("coreDebug"))
00023       coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue();
00024     else
00025       coreDebug = false;
00026   }
00027   else if (stage == 1)
00028   {
00029     ccEV <<"initializing BaseConnectionManager\n";
00030 
00031     BaseWorldUtility* world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00032 
00033     assert(world != 0);
00034 
00035     playgroundSize = world->getPgs();
00036     useTorus = world->useTorus();
00037 
00038     if(hasPar("sendDirect"))
00039       sendDirect = par("sendDirect").boolValue();
00040     else
00041       sendDirect = false;
00042 
00043     maxInterferenceDistance = calcInterfDist();
00044     maxDistSquared = maxInterferenceDistance * maxInterferenceDistance;
00045 
00046     //----initialize node grid-----
00047     //step 1 - calculate dimension of grid
00048     //one cell should have the size of maxInterferenceDistance
00049     Coord dim((*playgroundSize) / maxInterferenceDistance + Coord(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
00050 
00051     gridDim = GridCoord(dim);
00052 
00053     //A grid smaller or equal to 3x3 whould mean that every cell has every other cell as direct
00054     //neighbor (if our playground is a torus, even if not the most of the cells are direct
00055     //neighbors of each other. So we reduce the grid size to 1x1.
00056     if((gridDim.x <= 3) && (gridDim.y <= 3) && (gridDim.z <= 3))
00057     {
00058       gridDim.x = 1;
00059       gridDim.y = 1;
00060       gridDim.z = 1;
00061     }
00062 
00063     //step 2 - initialize the matrix which represents our grid
00064     NicEntries entries;
00065     RowVector row;
00066     NicMatrix matrix;
00067 
00068     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.z; ++i) {
00069       row.push_back(entries);         //copy empty NicEntries to RowVector
00070     }
00071     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.y; ++i) { //fill the ColVector with copies of
00072       matrix.push_back(row);          //the RowVector.
00073     }
00074     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.x; ++i) { //fill the grid with copies of
00075       nicGrid.push_back(matrix);        //the matrix.
00076     }
00077     ccEV << " using " << gridDim.x << "x" <<
00078                gridDim.y << "x" <<
00079                gridDim.z << " grid" << endl;
00080 
00081     //step 3 -  calculate the factor which maps the coordinate of a node
00082     //      to the grid cell
00083 
00084     if (gridDim.x == 1 &&                       //if we use a 1x1 grid
00085       gridDim.y == 1 &&                       //every coordinate is
00086       gridDim.z == 1) {                       //mapped to (1,1, 1)
00087       findDistance = FWMath::max(playgroundSize->getX(),        //so the factor is the
00088                      FWMath::max(playgroundSize->getY(),  //largest number a
00089                            playgroundSize->getZ())) //coordinate can get (+1)
00090                + 1.0;
00091     } else {
00092       findDistance = ceil(maxInterferenceDistance);   //otherwise the factor is our
00093       if(findDistance == maxInterferenceDistance)     //maxInterferenceDistance
00094         findDistance += EPSILON;                  //plus a small epsilon
00095     }
00096     ccEV << "findDistance is " << findDistance << endl;
00097   }
00098 }

00100 BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord BaseConnectionManager::getCellForCoordinate(const Coord& c) {
00101     return GridCoord(c, findDistance);
00102 }

00104 void BaseConnectionManager::updateConnections(int nicID, const Coord* oldPos, const Coord* newPos)
00105 {
00106   GridCoord oldCell = getCellForCoordinate(*oldPos);
00107     GridCoord newCell = getCellForCoordinate(*newPos);
00108 
00109   checkGrid(oldCell, newCell, nicID );
00110 }

00112 BaseConnectionManager::NicEntries& BaseConnectionManager::getCellEntries(BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& cell) {
00113     return nicGrid[cell.x][cell.y][cell.z];
00114 }

00116 void BaseConnectionManager::registerNicExt(int nicID)
00117 {
00118   NicEntry* nicEntry = nics[nicID];
00119 
00120   GridCoord cell = getCellForCoordinate(nicEntry->pos);
00121 
00122   ccEV <<" registering (ext) nic at loc " << cell.info() << std::endl;
00123 
00124   // add to matrix
00125   NicEntries& cellEntries = getCellEntries(cell);
00126     cellEntries[nicID] = nicEntry;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void BaseConnectionManager::checkGrid(BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& oldCell,
00130                                       BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& newCell,
00131                                       int id)
00132 
00133 {
00134 
00135     // structure to find union of grid squares
00136     CoordSet gridUnion(74);
00137 
00138     // find nic at old position
00139     NicEntries& oldCellEntries = getCellEntries(oldCell);
00140     NicEntries::iterator it = oldCellEntries.find(id);
00141     NicEntry *nic = it->second;
00142 
00143 
00144     // move nic to a new position in matrix
00145     if(oldCell != newCell) {
00146       oldCellEntries.erase(it);
00147       getCellEntries(newCell)[id] = nic;
00148     }
00149 
00150   if((gridDim.x == 1) && (gridDim.y == 1) && (gridDim.z == 1)) {
00151     gridUnion.add(oldCell);
00152     } else {
00153     //add grid around oldPos
00154     fillUnionWithNeighbors(gridUnion, oldCell);
00155 
00156 
00157         if(oldCell != newCell) {
00158             //add grid around newPos
00159             fillUnionWithNeighbors(gridUnion, newCell);
00160         }
00161     }
00162 
00163     GridCoord* c = gridUnion.next();
00164     while(c != 0) {
00165     ccEV << "Update cons in [" << c->info() << "]" << endl;
00166     updateNicConnections(getCellEntries(*c), nic);
00167     c = gridUnion.next();
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 int BaseConnectionManager::wrapIfTorus(int value, int max) {
00172   if(value < 0) {
00173     if(useTorus) {
00174       return max + value;
00175     } else {
00176       return -1;
00177     }
00178   } else if(value >= max) {
00179     if(useTorus) {
00180       return value - max;
00181     } else {
00182       return -1;
00183     }
00184   } else {
00185     return value;
00186   }
00187 }
00188 
00189 void BaseConnectionManager::fillUnionWithNeighbors(CoordSet& gridUnion, GridCoord cell) {
00190   for(int iz = (int)cell.z - 1; iz <= (int)cell.z + 1; iz++) {
00191     if(iz != cell.z && cell.use2D) {
00192       continue;
00193     }
00194     int cz = wrapIfTorus(iz, gridDim.z);
00195     if(cz == -1) {
00196       continue;
00197     }
00198     for(int ix = (int)cell.x - 1; ix <= (int)cell.x + 1; ix++) {
00199       int cx = wrapIfTorus(ix, gridDim.x);
00200       if(cx == -1) {
00201         continue;
00202       }
00203       for(int iy = (int)cell.y - 1; iy <= (int)cell.y + 1; iy++) {
00204         int cy = wrapIfTorus(iy, gridDim.y);
00205         if(cy != -1) {
00206           if(cell.use2D) {
00207             gridUnion.add(GridCoord(cx, cy));
00208           } else {
00209             gridUnion.add(GridCoord(cx, cy, cz));
00210           }
00211         }
00212       }
00213     }
00214   }
00215 }
00216 
00217 void BaseConnectionManager::updateNicConnections(NicEntries& nmap, NicEntry* nic)
00218 {
00219     int id = nic->nicId;
00220 
00221     for(NicEntries::iterator i = nmap.begin(); i != nmap.end(); ++i)
00222     {
00223     NicEntry* nic_i = i->second;
00224 
00225         // no recursive connections
00226         if ( nic_i->nicId == id ) continue;
00227 
00228     double distance;
00229 
00230         if(useTorus)
00231         {
00232           distance = nic->pos.sqrTorusDist(nic_i->pos, playgroundSize);
00233         } else {
00234           distance = nic->pos.sqrdist(nic_i->pos);
00235         }
00236 
00237         bool inRange = (distance <= maxDistSquared);
00238         bool connected = nic->isConnected(nic_i);
00239 
00240 
00241         if ( inRange && !connected ){
00242             // nodes within communication range: connect
00243             // nodes within communication range && not yet connected
00244             ccEV << "nic #" << id << " and #" << nic_i->nicId << " are in range" << endl;
00245             nic->connectTo( nic_i );
00246             nic_i->connectTo( nic );
00247         }
00248         else if ( !inRange && connected ){
00249             // out of range: disconnect
00250             // out of range, and still connected
00251             ccEV << "nic #" << id << " and #" << nic_i->nicId << " are NOT in range" << endl;
00252             nic->disconnectFrom( nic_i );
00253             nic_i->disconnectFrom( nic );
00254         }
00255     }
00256 }

00258 bool BaseConnectionManager::registerNic(cModule* nic, ChannelAccess* chAccess, const Coord* nicPos)
00259 {
00260   assert(nic != 0);
00261 
00262   int nicID = nic->getId();
00263   ccEV << " registering nic #" << nicID << endl;
00264 
00265   // create new NicEntry
00266   NicEntry *nicEntry;
00267 
00268   if(sendDirect)
00269     nicEntry = new NicEntryDirect(coreDebug);
00270   else
00271     nicEntry = new NicEntryDebug(coreDebug);
00272 
00273   // fill nicEntry
00274   nicEntry->nicPtr = nic;
00275   nicEntry->nicId = nicID;
00276   nicEntry->hostId = nic->getParentModule()->getId();
00277   nicEntry->pos = nicPos;
00278   nicEntry->chAccess = chAccess;
00279 
00280   // add to map
00281   nics[nicID] = nicEntry;
00282 
00283   registerNicExt(nicID);
00284 
00285   updateConnections(nicID, nicPos, nicPos);
00286 
00287   return sendDirect;
00288 }

00290 void BaseConnectionManager::updateNicPos(int nicID, const Coord* newPos)
00291 {
00292   NicEntry* nicEntry = nics[nicID];
00293   if(nicEntry == 0)
00294     error("No nic with this ID is registered with this ConnectionManager.");
00295 
00296     Coord oldPos = nicEntry->pos;
00297     nicEntry->pos = newPos;
00298 
00299   updateConnections(nicID, &oldPos, newPos);
00300 }

00312 BaseConnectionManager::~BaseConnectionManager()
00313 {
00314   for (NicEntries::iterator ne = nics.begin(); ne != nics.end(); ne++)
00315   {
00316     delete ne->second;
00317   }
00318 }
